column4: when trying to install a tar.gz file i *always* get stuck on the './configure' step... i feel like im missing something obvious... do i need to write something before the ./configure?
if you dont know what ./configure is doing you need to do some more research and understand the implications of compiling from source -- ie. you will not get security updates
lstarnes and cabrey; thank you. im trying to install a new theme to my gnome desktop
